<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns number representing the type of control, which is also defined by ''type'' property in config. For more information see [[Arma: GUI Configuration]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlType''' control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_type = [[ctrlType]] _rscEdit; // 2</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlCreate]], [[Arma: GUI Configuration]]
</value></part></template>
